message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 12-8-1, translated into all languages

data.en:
1. At country level

A small number of missing values – unknown responses and/or blanks – are treated as zeros in the calculation of the question scores. Where they represent more than 50% of the responses to a single question, the component score is not calculated. In such cases, the component score will be reported as not available when results are disseminated.

  1. At regional level

Regional values are not calculated.
